JOB DESCRIPTION:
IT Software Developer 

Job Summary:

a. Hands- on working experience using C#,  ASP.NET and SQL Server technologies

b. Hands- on working experience in development of .NET applications both desktop

and web applications 

c. Good understanding of design patterns 

d. Hands on experience in SQL server database (SPs,  triggers,  functions,  designing

tables,  performance tuning,  query plan etc) 

Job Specifications:

a. BE/  Btech -  IT with 1 – 2 years’ experience

b. .Net with C#,  SQL Server,  REST API,  Java Script knowledge 

c. MS Office knowledge 

d. Familiarity with Agile models 

e. Good team player
